pageContext.claim: “Since I took office, we've picked up trillions of dollars. Trillions. And, frankly, China has lost trillions of dollars, as you very well know.”
pageContext.analysis: The Shanghai Stock Exchange Composite Index is basically flat since Trump took the oath of office. The president appears to be getting the 38 percent figure from the high the index achieved in June 2016, but it fell sharply before Trump became president.
